bibl.title: Shipping Order from Metropolitan Life Insurance Company to Philip Showalter Hench, August 22, 1940

div1.p: This shipping order notes that photographs of Reed have been sent to Hench.

div1.head: Shipping Order from Metropolitan Life Insurance Company to Philip Showalter Hench, August 22, 1940
div1.opener:
METROPOLITAN LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY
HOME OFFICE SHIPPING ORDER
Mr. R. J. STEINER, Manager,
SUPPLY DIVISION
__________________________________________________
Ship to
Dr. P. S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minn.
__________________________________________________
Shipping Instructions must be TYPEWRITTEN and carefully completed to avoid unnecessary delays.
Send Copies S.D.29-A-B-D to the Supply Division
__________________________________________________
div1.closer:
Section Welfare Code No. 781 Signature H.M. Gross Date 8/22/40
__________________________________________________
EXPLANATION OF TERMS
Note A--OUT OF STOCK--Temporarily out of stock.
Will be sent automatically as soon as re-
plenished.
B--REDUCED--Reduced in quality to what seems
a generous allowance. If more are required,
please explain.
C--STOCK LOW--Reduced in quantity because
supply is limited. Will be sent automatically
as soon as replenished.
D--DISCONTINUED--Discontinued. No substi-
tute.
__________________________________________________
CONTENTS OF THIS PACKAGE HAVE BEEN CHECKED AND PACKED
By 8/23 . If complaint is made, this form must be returned.
METROPOLITAN LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY
R. J. STEINER, Manager
SUPPLY DIVISION
1 MADISON AVENUE
Form S.D. 29-D--Apr. 1938--PRINTED IN U.S.A.
NEW YORK, N. Y.
